thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Kevin
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Kevin

author: Kevin
title: Kevin
text:
Costa Rican Vacations really delivered. The airport concierge was a great way to start the vacation, making entry to the country extraordinarily easy. All of the private drivers were on-time (sometimes early), professional and informative. The activities they arranged were fabulous. The accommodations were on par with the best we've enjoyed in Europe and North America.
For the traveler, Costa Rica is a "must see" destination. The climate is perfect (particularly if you like it hot), the people are wonderful, the wildlife is fabulous and the scenery is second to none.
I highly recommend both Costa Rica as a destination and Costa Rican Vacations as an agent to make your trip a worry-free success.
